projects.title: AI-Powered Customer Analytics Platform
projects.description: Advanced machine learning platform that analyzes customer behavior patterns and provides actionable insights for e-commerce businesses.
projects.longDescription: Built a comprehensive AI-powered analytics platform that processes millions of customer interactions daily. The system uses advanced machine learning models to predict customer behavior, optimize pricing strategies, and improve conversion rates.

projects.title: Enterprise SaaS Management Platform
projects.description: Comprehensive SaaS platform for managing enterprise workflows, team collaboration, and business intelligence with real-time analytics.
projects.longDescription: Developed a scalable enterprise SaaS platform serving 500+ companies. Features include advanced workflow automation, real-time collaboration tools, and comprehensive business intelligence dashboards.

projects.title: Cross-Platform Mobile Banking App
projects.description: Secure, feature-rich mobile banking application with biometric authentication, real-time transactions, and AI-powered fraud detection.
projects.longDescription: Created a secure mobile banking application for iOS and Android with advanced security features. Includes real-time transaction processing, biometric authentication, and AI-powered fraud detection.

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform with AI Recommendations
projects.description: Modern e-commerce platform with personalized AI product recommendations, advanced search, and seamless checkout experience.
projects.longDescription: Built a high-performance e-commerce platform with AI-powered product recommendations. Features include advanced search functionality, personalized shopping experiences, and seamless payment integration.

projects.title: Healthcare Management System
projects.description: Comprehensive healthcare management platform with patient records, appointment scheduling, telemedicine, and analytics dashboard.
projects.longDescription: Developed a full-featured healthcare management system that streamlines patient care, appointment scheduling, and medical record management. Includes telemedicine capabilities and comprehensive analytics for healthcare providers.

projects.title: Real Estate Platform
projects.description: Modern real estate marketplace with virtual property tours, AI-powered property matching, and seamless transaction management.
projects.longDescription: Built an innovative real estate platform featuring 360Â° virtual property tours, AI-powered property recommendations, and integrated transaction management. Includes mobile apps for agents and buyers.
results: Virtual tours reduce site visits by 40%

projects.title: Velora - Premium Ride-Hailing Platform
projects.description: Modern ride-hailing mobile application for Ghana with real-time location tracking, seamless booking, and premium ride options.
projects.longDescription: Developed a comprehensive ride-hailing platform specifically designed for the Ghanaian market. The app features real-time GPS tracking, interactive map integration with Google Maps, multiple ride tiers (Economy and Comfort), and a complete ride history system. Built with a focus on user experience, the app includes intuitive location selection, driver information display, and transparent pricing in Ghanaian Cedis.
results: Complete ride history with driver details

projects.title: Wellness Tracker - Health & Wellness Platform
projects.description: Comprehensive wellness tracking and booking mobile application with progress monitoring, session scheduling, and membership management.
projects.longDescription: Created a full-featured wellness application that empowers users to track their health journey. The app includes daily wellness tips, progress tracking for hydration, meditation, and sleep with beautiful circular progress indicators. Features include session booking for wellness services (Detox, Massage, Yoga), membership management with tiered plans (Silver and Gold), and comprehensive tracking dashboards. The intuitive UI uses pastel colors and clean design to create a calming, health-focused experience.

projects.title: Chez Amis Bar and Grill - Premium Restaurant Website
projects.description: Elegant and sophisticated restaurant website featuring online reservations, food ordering, menu display, and an immersive culinary experience showcase.
projects.longDescription: Designed and developed a premium restaurant website for Chez Amis Bar and Grill, an upscale dining establishment in Accra, Ghana. The website features a luxurious dark theme with golden accents, creating an intimate and sophisticated atmosphere that reflects the restaurant's culinary excellence. Key features include seamless online table reservations, food ordering for delivery, comprehensive menu display with signature dishes, photo gallery showcasing culinary artistry, private dining information, and guest testimonials. The design emphasizes elegance and premium hospitality, with carefully crafted typography and spacing that creates a memorable first impression.
results: Elegant dark theme with premium golden accents
